edit_email_dialog_enter_your_password_to: Ingiza nywila yako ili kubadilisha barua pepe yako
edit_email_dialog_are_you_sure_you_want_: Je, una uhakika unataka kubadilisha barua pepe ya akaunti yako kuwa: __email__?
edit_email_dialog_email_sent_with_passwo:
Barua pepe imetumwa na maagizo ya kuweka upya nywila

Ikiwa huwezi kupata barua pepe, tafadhali angalia folda yako ya spam.
edit_email_dialog_you_must_set_password_: Lazima uweke nywila ili kubadilisha barua pepe yako
